author: ryan_c_byrd
title: Found late, but just in time for the 90th anniversary set.
review:
As a kid, I never had the set this is based on, though it looked cool back then.  But I saw this set/book after it was unavailable.

 

Pros:

Lots of detail for its size.

Includes shapes and functions from the source material (good representation).

Easy to source parts.

Lots cheaper than the original.

 

Cons:

To get it, you often get a book you may not want.

Paper instructions are not so easy to get.

 

Overall:

This set makes a good small replacement for the original.  Of course, the new 90th anniversary set blows it out of the water. But, if you want a small version to hang from string that can be built with easily sourced parts, this fits the bill.
